page.discussion: Navigates to the specified page. Target can be an absolute page number (e.g. '23'), or 'first', 'prev', 'next' or 'last'. You can also specify 'next-loop' and 'prev-loop'. If you are on the last pagd and you specify 'Next-Loop', the Grid will display to the first page. If you are on the first page and you specify 'Prev-Loop', the Grid will display the last page.
